channel.title: Revival google
channel.description:
[img]http://www.rune-server.org/static/toplist/281113.png[/img] Features 24/7 VPS Perfect Combat Pvp Fully complete Pvn Fully complete X-logging Many Skills working Many minigames All Random Events Pets Treasure Trails Skill Interfaces Nostalgic Feel
UPDATES!!!!!!!!!!!! 1# Added Lesser Demon to the Wizard tower near Draynor 2# Added Canifis City NPC's 3# Banana-harvesting (picking bananas from trees - Karamja) 4# Added mage bank shop (includes God capes, Staff's) 5# Added Oziach's Armour (includes rune platebody [YES FINALLY for you players], and green d'hide body) 6# All slayer shops have been fixed 7# Fixed too high price for green d'hides alch 8# Added Barker's Haberdashery Shop 9# Mithril seeds has been added 10# Siegfried Erkle Shop has been added to Legends guild (2 floor correct location) 11# Few clue scrolls fixed 1# Fixed Kolodian shop (Not opening) 2# Added Monkeys to Karamja 3# Scavvo's Rune Store has been added to Champions guild 4# Added Dragon SQ making from the left+right side's 5# Added loads of new Clue NPC's from help of "Mushroom"! 6# Stability and bug fixes 1# gundai now opens shop 2# added another team-cape shop to wilderness 3# Added shop lumb dungeon where you can buy barrow gloves 4# added heros guild shops 5# one more dupe fixed 6# loads of skilling bugs fixed 7# Pets 8# fixed the prices of barrows gloves
Perfect Combat Pvp Fully complete Pvn Fully complete X-logging Many Skills working Many minigames All Random Events Pets Treasure Trails Skill Interfaces Nostalgic Feel - All working skills including agility you just need to figure out the system yourself. (really easy) - Mini-Quests, used these as a base before releasing quests which we never released. - Working mini-games, including barrows fixed. - 100s of clues fixed. - Almost 100% Slayer all NPCs added, just didn't add some reqs or tasks to certain slayer masters. - Fixed a memory leak - Fixed shops only loading to 165 - Fixed 2 dupes. - Many items fixed (couldn't wield or had no use) - Created a better yell system. - Fixed up all levers none worked before hand. - Fixed NPCs using wrong attacked (Melee, range and mage) - Updated skills, you can no longer dupe when runecrafting, fixed timers + interface options. - More to be listed I just forgot things I added.
Media [img]http://puu.sh/4Ejx6.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/4EjER.png[/img] [img]http://i1282.photobucket.com/albums/a526/dylan1496/Untitled.png[/img]
Client Link: [url=http://www.filedropper.com/revivalrsclient_1]http://www.filedropper.com/revivalrsclient_1[/url] download fast!!

item.title: Revival google
item.dc:creator: @jaytjee19 jaytjee19
item.description:
@jaytjee19 wrote:


Features
24/7 VPS
Perfect Combat
Pvp Fully complete
Pvn Fully complete
X-logging
Many Skills working
Many minigames
All Random Events
Pets
Treasure Trails
Skill Interfaces
Nostalgic Feel

UPDATES!!!
1# Added Lesser Demon to the Wizard tower near Draynor
2# Added Canifis City NPC’s
3# Banana-harvesting (picking bananas from trees - Karamja)
4# Added mage bank shop (includes God capes, Staff’s)
5# Added Oziach’s Armour (includes rune platebody [YES FINALLY for you players], and green d’hide body)
6# All slayer shops have been fixed
7# Fixed too high price for green d’hides alch
8# Added Barker’s Haberdashery Shop
9# Mithril seeds has been added
10# Siegfried Erkle Shop has been added to Legends guild (2 floor correct location)
11# Few clue scrolls fixed
1# Fixed Kolodian shop (Not opening)
2# Added Monkeys to Karamja
3# Scavvo’s Rune Store has been added to Champions guild
4# Added Dragon SQ making from the left+right side’s
5# Added loads of new Clue NPC’s from help of “Mushroom”!
6# Stability and bug fixes
1# gundai now opens shop
2# added another team-cape shop to wilderness
3# Added shop lumb dungeon where you can buy barrow gloves
4# added heros guild shops
5# one more dupe fixed
6# loads of skilling bugs fixed
7# Pets
8# fixed the prices of barrows gloves

Perfect Combat
Pvp Fully complete
Pvn Fully complete
X-logging
Many Skills working
Many minigames
All Random Events
Pets
Treasure Trails
Skill Interfaces
Nostalgic Feel

  • All working skills including agility you just need to figure out the system yourself. (really easy)
  • Mini-Quests, used these as a base before releasing quests which we never released.
  • Working mini-games, including barrows fixed.
  • 100s of clues fixed.
  • Almost 100% Slayer all NPCs added, just didn’t add some reqs or tasks to certain slayer masters.
  • Fixed a memory leak
  • Fixed shops only loading to 165
  • Fixed 2 dupes.
  • Many items fixed (couldn’t wield or had no use)
  • Created a better yell system.
  • Fixed up all levers none worked before hand.
  • Fixed NPCs using wrong attacked (Melee, range and mage)
  • Updated skills, you can no longer dupe when runecrafting, fixed timers + interface options.
  • More to be listed I just forgot things I added.

Media


Client Link: http://www.filedropper.com/revivalrsclient_1
download fast!!
